privates.name: Northern Kansas Railrooad
privates.description: Controls hexes I13 and I15.  May place yellow track there for free.

privates.name: Sioux City & Pacific Railroad
privates.description: Controls hexes F16 and F18.  May place yellow track there for free.

privates.name: Antioch Potash Railway
privates.description: Controls hex E9.  May place yellow track and/oor Potash Railway station token in hexagon.

privates.name: St. Paul & Dakota Railroad
privates.description: Controls hexes C19 and C21.  May place yellow track there for free.

privates.name: Omaha & Southwestern Railroad
privates.description: Ownership of Omaha & Southwestern minor railroad.  Pays once and closes.

privates.name: P. Chadwick Cook
privates.description: President's Certificate of the TraXX Railroad.  Closes at the start of Phase 4.

notes.note: Shares in the market pay dividends to the corporation
No more than 50% of a corporation's shares may be in the market at any time
Shares cannot be sold during the first stock round

legend.description: Shares of this corporation do not count toward the certificate limit.
